
机器地址字段1：（lsmem）
0x0000028080000000-0x0000033fffffffff
0x00000a8000000000-0x00000b3fffffffff
0x0000128000000000-0x0000133fffffffff
0x00001a8000000000-0x00001b3fffffffff

地址字段2：(memfabric支持的字段)
0x29580000000 0x34000000000
0xa9580000000 0xb4000000000
0x129580000000 0x134000000000
0x1a9580000000 0x1b4000000000

交集：
0x0000029580000000 - 0x0000033fffffffff
0x00000a9580000000 - 0x00000b3fffffffff
0x0000129580000000 - 0x0000133fffffffff
0x00001a9580000000 - 0x00001b3fffffffff

insmod obmm_allocator.ko memory=0x0000029580000000,384G,0x00000a9580000000,384G,0x0000129580000000,384G,0x00001a9580000000,384G granu=1G

obmm编译代码
https://gitee.com/aevdark/memfabric_hybrid/tree/br_A3_shm_bm_630_test/src/driver/kernel/obmm
